EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_Lean Startup Conference_Q415.Follow Up - Dinner
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You for Joining Pivotal at Lean Startup!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for visiting the Pivotal office and joining us for dinner during The Lean Startup Conference <[[http://leanstartup.co/conferences/lean-startup-conference-2015/]]> in San Francisco. We hope you enjoyed learning about Pivotal’s approach to building great software. Let’s stay connected!
- Watch <[[http://pivotal.io/event/leanstartupconf]]> the session Minimum Viable Taxes: Lessons learned building an MVP inside the IRS, co-presented by Pivotal and the IRS. - See highlights <[[http://pivotal.io/event/leanstartupconf]]> from our special lunch sessions, The Real Meaning Behind Software Transformation for Businesses Today and Lean Startup Is Management: A Panel Discussion with Entrepreneurs. - Read the blog story <[[http://leanstartup.co/the-change-imperative-why-pivotal-advocates-lean-startup-management-practices/]]>, The Change Imperative: Why Pivotal Advocates Lean Startup Management Practices, Contributed to Lean Startup by Janice Fraser, Director of People at Pivotal.
We look forward to seeing you at the next Pivotal event <[[https://pivotal.io/news-events#events]]>!
Sincerely, The Pivotal Team
